sentences.en: " The lines around Kennesaw Mountain are impregnable.
sentences.cn: " 肯尼萨山周围的防线坚不可摧嘛.

sentences.en: Do pair of hackers trade on stockjobber net with respect to impregnable?
sentences.cn: 证券公司网上交易对黑客就固若金汤?

sentences.en: His position is impregnable as long as the sun shines.
sentences.cn: 他的地位是永远不会动摇的.

sentences.en: Impregnable pass is overflowed , pu Dingzheng is striding strong and vigorous walking hasty and forward.
sentences.cn: 雄关漫道, 普定正迈着矫健的步履匆匆向前.

sentences.en: On this problem, she was impregnable.
sentences.cn: 在这个问题上, 她是坚不可摧的.

sentences.en: Only in this way can you be an impregnable position for good.
sentences.cn: 也只有这样,你才能永远立于不败之地.

sentences.en: Reason: It is an impregnable fortress Fu Yu disaster.
sentences.cn: 理智: 是抚御灾难的铜墙铁壁.

sentences.en: The Bundesbank's seemingly impregnable position has begun to weaken.
sentences.cn: 德意志联邦银行看似不可撼动的地位开始削弱了。

sentences.en: The dike that is protected by Mangrove forest is impregnable!
sentences.cn: 红树林防护的堤坝,固若金汤!

sentences.en: The heights of Kennesaw were impregnable.
sentences.cn: 肯尼萨山的高地是坚不可摧的.

sentences.en: The lofty walls of the castle seemed impregnable.
sentences.cn: 这座城堡的高墙似乎坚不可摧.

sentences.en: The old Dutch fort with its thick high walls looks virtually impregnable.
sentences.cn: 古老的荷兰城堡城墙又厚又高，看起来几乎固若金汤。

sentences.en: The team built up an impregnable 5-1 lead.
sentences.cn: 这个队以5:1的绝对优势领先。

sentences.en: Their impregnable arguments are hard to rebut.
sentences.cn: 他们牢不可破的论点很难被驳倒.
他们将建造坚不可摧的城堡.

words.tran_cn: 无法攻取的；不受影响的；要塞坚固的；可以受孕的

trans.tran_cn: 攻不破的，坚不可摧的，无可辩驳，毫不动摇
trans.tran_en: a building that is impregnable is so strong that it cannot be entered by force
